languages.text: {n}Маршал вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "Вольный Торговец. Адептус Арбитес обращается к вам с просьбой о незамедлительном содействии. {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Священная десятина{/g}, собранная с Простора Коронус, в опасности — только вы способны отвести нависшую над ней угрозу".

{n}The Marshal raises his chin.{/n} "Rogue Trader. The Adeptus Arbites request your immediate cooperation. The {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} collected from the Koronus Expanse is in danger, and you are the only one who can negate this threat."
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал вздергивает подбородок.{/n} "Вольный Торговец. Адептус Арбитес обращается к вам с просьбой о незамедлительном содействии. {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}Священная десятина{/g}, собранная с Простора Коронус, в опасности — только вы способны отвести нависшую над ней угрозу".

{n}The Marshal raises his chin.{/n} "Rogue Trader. The Adeptus Arbites request your immediate cooperation. The {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} collected from the Koronus Expanse is in danger, and you are the only one who can negate this threat."

languages.text: {n}Le maréchal lève le menton.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. L'Adeptus Arbites requiert votre coopération immédiate. La {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}dîme sacrée{/g} collectée dans les Étendues de Koronus est en danger, et vous {mf|seul|seule} êtes en mesure de neutraliser cette menace. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal raises his chin.{/n} "Rogue Trader. The Adeptus Arbites request your immediate cooperation. The {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} collected from the Koronus Expanse is in danger, and you are the only one who can negate this threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le maréchal lève le menton.{/n} « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}. L'Adeptus Arbites requiert votre coopération immédiate. La dîme sacrée collectée dans les Étendues de Koronus est en danger, et vous {mf|seul|seule} êtes en mesure de neutraliser cette menace. »

languages.text: {n}El Mariscal alza la barbilla.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, el Adeptus Arbites solicita su cooperación inmediata. El {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacro diezmo{/g} de la Extensión de Koronus corre peligro y usted es {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} que puede neutralizar la amenaza».
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal raises his chin.{/n} "Rogue Trader. The Adeptus Arbites request your immediate cooperation. The {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} collected from the Koronus Expanse is in danger, and you are the only one who can negate this threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Mariscal alza la barbilla.{/n} «Comerciante Independiente, el Adeptus Arbites solicita su cooperación inmediata. El sacro diezmo de la Extensión de Koronus corre peligro y usted es {mf|el|la} únic{mf|o|a} que puede neutralizar la amenaza».

languages.text: {n}元帅扬起了下巴。{/n}“行商浪人，法务部请求你即刻协助。从科罗努斯扩区征收的{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}神圣什一税{/g}受到了威胁，而你是唯一可以解决威胁的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal raises his chin.{/n} "Rogue Trader. The Adeptus Arbites request your immediate cooperation. The {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} collected from the Koronus Expanse is in danger, and you are the only one who can negate this threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅扬起了下巴。{/n}“行商浪人，法务部请求你即刻协助。从科罗努斯扩区征收的神圣什一税受到了威胁，而你是唯一可以解决威胁的人。”

languages.text: {n}Der Marschall hebt sein Kinn.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das Adeptus Arbites erbittet Eure sofortige Kooperation. Der in der Koronus-Ausdehnung erhobene {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}heilige Zehnt{/g} ist in Gefahr, und nur Ihr könnt dieser Gefahr begegnen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal raises his chin.{/n} "Rogue Trader. The Adeptus Arbites request your immediate cooperation. The {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} collected from the Koronus Expanse is in danger, and you are the only one who can negate this threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Marschall hebt sein Kinn.{/n} "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Das Adeptus Arbites erbittet Eure sofortige Kooperation. Der in der Koronus-Ausdehnung erhobene heilige Zehnt ist in Gefahr, und nur Ihr könnt dieser Gefahr begegnen."

languages.text: {n}将帥は顎を上げる。{/n}「ローグトレーダー。高等裁定局は、あなたの迅速な協力を要請します。コロヌス・エクスパンスから回収した{g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}神聖なる租税{/g}が危険にさらされています。あなたこそがこの脅威を排除できる唯一の人です」
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal raises his chin.{/n} "Rogue Trader. The Adeptus Arbites request your immediate cooperation. The {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} collected from the Koronus Expanse is in danger, and you are the only one who can negate this threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}将帥は顎を上げる。{/n}「ローグトレーダー。高等裁定局は、あなたの迅速な協力を要請します。コロヌス・エクスパンスから回収した神聖なる租税が危険にさらされています。あなたこそがこの脅威を排除できる唯一の人です」

languages.text: {n}Miralay çenesini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir... Adeptus Arbites, acil bir iş birliği talebinde bulunuyor. Koronus Enginliği'nden toplanan {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}kutsal aşar{/g} tehlikede, söz konusu tehdidi bertaraf edebilecek de bir siz varsınız."
languages.original_text: {n}The Marshal raises his chin.{/n} "Rogue Trader. The Adeptus Arbites request your immediate cooperation. The {g|Encyclopedia:TitheGlossary}sacred tithe{/g} collected from the Koronus Expanse is in danger, and you are the only one who can negate this threat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Miralay çenesini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir... Adeptus Arbites, acil bir iş birliği talebinde bulunuyor. Koronus Enginliği'nden toplanan kutsal aşar tehlikede, söz konusu tehdidi bertaraf edebilecek de bir siz varsınız."
